sessions.description: Single-model validation system deployment and October 29 validation session

interactions.description: Decision: Redesigned validation interface from dual-model comparison to single-model focus

details.decision: Redesigned validation interface from dual-model comparison to single-model focus
details.reasoning: Dual-model comparison added complexity without value since we validate one model at a time. Single-model UI is cleaner, faster, and maintains separate validation files per model.

accomplishments.description: Created single-model validation interface with 8 new files (validation_app_single.py, templates, analysis tools) - 2400+ lines total
Validated 8 October 29 meetings with GPT-5, achieved 75% accuracy (6/8 correct), identified 2 systematic error patterns
Completed cross-day analysis of 16 meetings (Oct 28-29), confirmed consistent 75% accuracy pattern, -5% below production threshold
Created comprehensive documentation: CHECKPOINT_2025-10-29.md, GPT5_VALIDATION_SUMMARY.md, VALIDATION_SINGLE_MODEL_GUIDE.md
Completed git checkpoint with all validation files and analysis results committed

decisions_made.decision: Redesigned validation interface from dual-model comparison to single-model focus
decisions_made.reasoning: Dual-model comparison added complexity without value since we validate one model at a time. Single-model UI is cleaner, faster, and maintains separate validation files per model.
